column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////The kind words of the owner encouraged me to give Jinya another shot
column2: and I am happy to say that they delivered. We had about a party of 10
column3: and at 11:30 on a Friday night
column4: we were still able to be seated within 10 minutes. I tried the tonkotsu black this time and it was definitely much better than the assari. While it's not the best ramen I've had
column5: it was really rich in flavor and the meat was very tender. If you're thinking about coming
column6: I'd definitely recommend the tonkotsu black
column7: and coming during off hours makes it a much better experience.
